title: Ranked 5's Team LF Plat+ Top Laner
body:
Hi everyone, our ranked team is currently searching for a high Platinum+ Top Laner for serious ranked 5's games. We are in need of a player who has a microphone and is available during the opening hours of ranked 5's queue every night. 

Add me in game: CCG Eggzille

replies.body:
Hi I am new to game can i pples play for ur team?
available friday/sat/sun
